text: How can you check when an IAM User last accessed AWS through the console or programmatically?

answers.text: In the main AWS console, click your name, then select 'My Organization', and look under 'Status'.
In the main AWS console, click your name, then select 'My Account', and look under 'Account Settings'.
In the IAM Console, choose Users, and look under 'Last Activity'.
In the IAM Console, choose 'Credential Report' and then click 'Download Report'.
